name: Execute selection in Python and append
summary: Execute a selection in Python and paste result after
description:
This script executes a selection in Python and then pastes the result after that selection or replaces the selection. Useful for testing small software snippets and documenting them in the same buffer.

It is based on http://vim.wikia.com/wiki/Execute_Python_from_within_current_file
install_details: Just put into your .vimrc and then use command :Pyea (appends) or :Pyer (replaces) .

versions.release_notes: Now :Pyea appends after selection, and :Pyer replaces selection with results of Python snippet.
